Title: Prohibits ear clipping and tail docking of dogs and cats unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog or cat
Summary: Prohibits ear clipping and tail docking of dogs and cats unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog or cat.
LawCode: Amd ยง365, add ยง365-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting ear clipping and tail docking of dogs and cats unless deemed medically necessary to protect the life or health of the dog or cat
